books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The fourth book in the Shadow Riders series. A member of a Chicago crime family falls for a woman during a kidnapping.
books.name: SHADOW WARRIOR

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: A string of seemingly accidental and unrelated deaths confound F.B.I. agent Emmy Dockery.
books.name: UNSOLVED

books.author: by Elizabeth Gilbert
books.description: An 89-year-old Vivian Morris looks back at the direction her life took when she entered the 1940s New York theater scene.
books.name: CITY OF GIRLS

books.author: by Neal Stephenson
books.description: A dead multibillionaire’s brain is scanned and turned back on at a time when humans live as digital souls.
books.name: FALL; OR DODGE IN HELL

books.author: by Stuart Woods and Parnell Hall
books.description: The third book in the Teddy Fay series. Teddy Fay scours Paris’s underworld to find a treasonous criminal.
books.name: SKIN GAME

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Nalini Singh
books.description: The third book in the Psy-Changeling Trinity series.
books.name: WOLF RAIN

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Dorothea Benton Frank
books.description: A beekeeper’s quiet life is unsettled by her demanding mother, outgoing sister and neighboring widower.
books.name: QUEEN BEE

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Grace Healey investigates the fates of 12 women who were sent to occupied Europe to help the resistance during World War II.
books.name: THE LOST GIRLS OF PARIS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The fifth book in the Memory Man series. The first man Amos Decker put behind bars asks to have his name cleared.
books.name: REDEMPTION

books.author: by Jean Kwok
books.description: An immigrant Chinese family’s secrets emerge as Amy looks for her older sister, who vanished after flying to the Netherlands.
books.name: SEARCHING FOR SYLVIE LEE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher explores the New England town where his father was born and a Canadian couple now find themselves stranded.
books.name: PAST TENSE
